card_1.cardText:
Lady Doritos?
=============

It all started last week during an interview with PepsiCo’sA C.E.O., when she suggested a female-focused chip was on its way:

“_**For women, low-crunch, the full taste profile, not have so much of the flavor stick on the fingers, and how can you put it in a purse?**_“

[Listen to the Podcast](http://freakonomics.com/podcast/indra-nooyi/%20)

Why Target Female Consumers?

Money (est. $18 Trillion)
